allexchangewallets: SELECT DISTINCT recipient_id FROM transaction WHERE sender_id IN (5810532812037266198,-5063553784103844629) AND NOT recipient_id IS NULL UNION SELECT DISTINCT sender_id FROM transaction WHERE recipient_id IN (5810532812037266198,-5063553784103844629)
addexchanges: INSERT INTO exchange_wallets (wallet_id) VALUES (5810532812037266198);,INSERT INTO exchange_wallets (wallet_id) VALUES (-5063553784103844629);
getalltransactions: SELECT trans.amount, trans.fee, trans.recipient_id, trans.sender_id, trans.timestamp, trans.id as trans_id FROM transaction as trans INNER JOIN block ON trans.block_id=block.id WHERE block.timestamp > @starttime AND block.timestamp < @endtime and trans.amount>@burstamount;
getqualifyingtransactions: SELECT sender_id, amount, fee FROM all_weekly_trans as trans WHERE trans.recipient_id NOT IN (SELECT wallet_id FROM exchange_wallets);
getpoolwallets: SELECT DISTINCT id FROM account where name Like '%Pool%'
getwinnerdata: SELECT trans_id from all_weekly_trans WHERE sender_id=@winner LIMIT 1;
